mods.name: MC Command Center

mods.name: UI Cheats Extension
mods.description: Right-click on UI elements to modify needs, skills, money and more
mods.descriptionES: Haz clic derecho en elementos de la UI para modificar necesidades, habilidades, dinero y más
mods.author: Weerbesu

mods.name: Basemental Drugs
mods.description: Adds drugs, alcohol and gangs to your game

mods.author: Basemental

mods.name: Extreme Violence
mods.description: Adds violent interactions and murder to the game - Manual installation required
mods.descriptionES: Añade interacciones violentas y asesinatos al juego - Requiere instalación manual
mods.author: Sacrificial

mods.name: Slice of Life
mods.description: Adds realism with physical changes, personality, emotions and more
mods.descriptionES: Añade realismo con cambios físicos, personalidad, emociones y más

mods.name: Wonderful Whims
mods.description: Menstrual cycle, birth control, attraction system and more

mods.name: Private Practice
mods.description: Run your own medical practice from home - Patreon exclusive
mods.descriptionES: Administra tu propia consulta médica desde casa - Exclusivo de Patreon

mods.name: Meaningful Stories
mods.description: Overhauls emotions to make them more realistic and meaningful
mods.descriptionES: Renueva las emociones para hacerlas más realistas y significativas
